text: jisamen vah hamesha (jalata bhunata) rahega yahee to badee roosavaee hai munaapheqeen is baat se daraten hain ki (kaheen aisa na ho) in mulasamaanon par (rasool kee maarafat) koee soora naazil ho jae jo unako jo kuchh un munaaphiqeen ke dil mein hai bata de (ai rasool) tum kah do ki (achchha) tum masakharaapan kie jao
